Home Depot

Home Depot Brand Guidelines

brand.yml 
orange: "#F96302"
white: "#FFFFFF"
black: "#000000"

primary: $orange
secondary: "#747474"
light: $white
dark: $black

font:
  heading:
    family: Helvetica Nueue LT Pro
    weight: bold
    width: condensed
  body:
    family: Helvetica Nueue LT Pro
    weight: normal
